subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Stay Thirsty, his owner’s second-string horse behind Uncle Mo, won the Gotham Grade III at Aqueduct, bolstering his team’s Triple Crown hopes.
snippet: Stay Thirsty, his owner’s second-string horse behind Uncle Mo, won the Gotham Grade III at Aqueduct, bolstering his team’s Triple Crown hopes.
